about_the_game:
Voices of Freedom is a classic point-and-click game where the player must solve puzzles. The game portrays the lives of women who fought for their freedom in oppressive contexts. With traditional graphic adventure gameplay and a touching narrative, it offers a challenging and immersive experience that will lead you to make crucial decisions on the path to freedom.

STORY

Delve into the lives of women whose stories are intertwined by their struggle for human rights. Through Narges's narration, follow the story of Mahsa Amini, arrested for not wearing her hijab "correctly," and discover how her fight intersects with that of other women. As you progress, you'll need to solve puzzles to advance the story and face decisions that will change the characters' destinies.

DIFFERENT ENDINGS

Your choices will determine whether the women survive or perish in their struggle. A story filled with moments of tension, but also humor and drama, where every choice matters.

BASED ON REAL EVENTS

Inspired by real events that have moved the world, Voices of Freedom is based on documented facts from news, books, and films. From Narges Mohammadi's "White Torture" to international headlines, this game connects the player with real stories of struggle and resistance.

SUPPORT WOMEN'S ORGANIZATIONS IN IRAN

With the purchase of this game, you will help support women in Iran. A portion of the proceeds will be donated to organizations dedicated to empowering these women and advocating for their rights.

Get ready to solve puzzles, face difficult decisions, and immerse yourself in an adventure that has inspired a global movement.

short_description: Las historias de cinco mujeres se entrelazan en una aventura gráfica clásica de apuntar y hacer clic, arrojando luz sobre la desigualdad que enfrentan las mujeres en Teherán. Este juego narrativo y de rompecabezas trata sobre el movimiento Mujer, Vida, Libertad.
